Dialogue.Page: Heya, hatchling. Yes, it's me, the famous Feldspar. Everything you've heard about is true.
Except for the things that aren't.
I'll be honest, it's weird being back here with all of you. I've spent so long flying around the Outer Wilds that I forgot how nice it is to share a song with Gneiss.
I'll rest for a while, but then I'll be ready to take off again.
After all, it's not every day the sun rises on a new horizon.
